name: Wholemart Rampage
description:
Wholemart was made in one week for the Brackeys Gamejam 2021.

Your mom always takes hours to do the grocery shopping at Wholemart. 

It's boring... But now is your time!

Time to cause mayhem and chaos! Destroy as many shelves as possible.

But beware of the employees and don't get caught by your mom, or you'll be in BIG trouble!

Controls:

WASD for walking Spacebar for tackle
